description.value:
Your celestial powers allow you to remove lesser afflictions with ease.

Each day, you can cast two 4th-level divine innate spells. You can choose from the following spells each time you cast: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Curse]{Remove Curse}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Remove Disease]{Remove Disease}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Neutralize Poison]{Neutralize Poison}.
